message:
Hey nice article,  
I would like to do exactly the same thing you have done here with streaming a zip file but instead of streaming a zip file contents I would like it to be the results of an entity framework core query, any idea how I would go about this? Effectively I want to stream an entity framework query results to a browser via a REST style [asp.net](http://asp.net "asp.net") core app . Any pointers or advice would be greatly appreciated!
